value:
$WmMPID_ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Normal,Face_Pain2|Oh, Gustav...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain2|Father...$k$pWhen he said that our family had
suffered a loss and that we must
move forward...$k$pHe wasn't talking about Alfonse. He
was talking about himself.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain2|I...$k$p$WmMPID_ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Normal,Face_Pain2|Alfonse, don't blame yourself.$k$pHe was glad to sacrifice himself to
save you. Never doubt that.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|But Father... I... How can I compare to
him?$k$p$WmMPID_ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Normal,Face_Pain2|Alfonse, listen to me. Your father was
ill. He hadn't long left.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain2|Ill? Father? He looked as strong as
ever.$k$p$WmMPID_ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Normal,Face_Pain2|That's your father. He was hiding it.
He wanted the people to feel at ease;
and Askr's foes, on guard.$k$pHis plan was to hide all this until you
were ready to succeed the throne.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|How little I understood...of his plans
and of his heart.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain2|Alfonse...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|He showed me a dead branch... Was
there something to that? Tell me.$k$p$WmMPID_ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Normal,Face|Oh, yes. The sword of bravery...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|The sword of bravery?$k$p$WmMPID_ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Normal,Face|That's what you called it. You can't
have been much older than three...$k$pYou were just starting to learn about
what it meant to be the Prince of
Askr.$k$pYou brought your father a branch
and presented it to him quite
solemnly.$k$pYou had your own branch, too, and
posed like a warrior.$k$pYou looked up at him and said,
"Father, together we'll protect Askr!"$k$p"I want to help!"$k$pYour father...the king...could barely
hide his smile.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Father...$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|The conflict has reached a stalemate.
The enemy has inundated the area
by the gate to the realm of the dead.$k$pThe king's knights have contained
them there, so battle hasn't spread...
yet.$k$pReinforcements continue to spill from
the gate. Hel's forces seem to have
no end.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|The longer this stalemate lasts, the
more of an advantage she gains. She
can pick us off one by one...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|And the commander of the king's
knights has fallen.$k$pThe queen and the captain of the
knights have things under control,
but we're on the defensive now.$k$pThere's no time to waste. It's up to
the Order of Heroes to stop Hel.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Alfonse and I spent last night
scouring the royal library for clues.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|There were some passages that
seemed promising, but in the end,
nothing we found was useful.$k$pBut we're not done searching for
answers.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|Where next? I'm ready to go!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|We must cross through Death's
gate.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|What?!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|You intend to scout the realm of the
dead...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Hel is its sovereign. Where better
to uncover information on our
enemy?$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|The enemy's numbers are
increasing...slowly but steadily.$k$pWe have to slip a handful of troops
through their lines and into the realm
of the dead, or else...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|This is a dangerous mission. We
might not come back from it.$k$pBut it's also crucial that we find a
way to put a stop to Hel, and this
gambit offers us that chance.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|The Order of Heroes is built for
small-scale operations like this.
We can do it.$k$p$EFace_Cool|All right, then! Here we go. We'll
take the fight to Hel and save Askr.
Who's with me?$k$p

$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|Tell me, $Nu...$k$pThis plan... What do you think of it?
Will you enter the realm of the dead?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Eir...$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|Why do you resist? I've seen you
struggle. Why? You cannot win. Not
against Death.$k$pAll will be killed, and the ranks of the
dead will swell with Askr's citizens...
That is what Mother wants.$k$pShe is the ruler of the dead, and she
can kill as she pleases. She will not
be defied.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|I don't believe it. It is not that simple.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|What?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|She's just not that powerful. If she
was, everyone in Askr would be dead.$k$pAskr would have fallen already. If
she could have, she would have
eliminated us all in one strike.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Her curse must have its limits.$k$pAt least nine days are required for it
to come due, for one...$k$pAnd only one person can be cursed
at a time, I'd wager.$k$pThat's not to mention that Hel herself
had to show her face—both to lay the
curse and to claim her victim.$k$pThere's been no other sign of her.
Why? Because she has a weakness.
There must be a way to defeat her.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|You have your own mind... And you
don't fear my mother.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Oh, I fear her. But cowering here
won't accomplish a thing.$k$pCome to think of it, when I was a
child, I was terrified of monsters.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|Monsters?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Run all you want, but they'll find
you. You can't hurt them, either.
Horrifying, wouldn't you say?$k$pBut Hel is not a ghoul from a child's
imagination. She's real, and I have to
face her.$k$pI must defeat her. And I can defeat
her! I'm sure of it.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|Defeat my mother? Defeat Death?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Indeed. There's always a thread...
Pull on it, and things start
unraveling.$k$pWe just have to find the thread.$k$p$Sbs150|
